info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 6:31PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Moderate to Heavy snowfall will impact portions of west central Hidalgo County through 700 PM MST... At 625 PM MST, NWS Meteorologists were tracking a band of moderate to heavy snowfall impacting Interstate 10 west of Lordsburg. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy snowfall and winds in excess of 45 mph reducing visibility to 0.5 to 2 SM. SOURCE...Satellite, surface observations, and web cameras. IMPACT...Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility overnight. Locations impacted include... Steins, Lordsburg, Road Forks, Lordsburg Playa, and Shakespeare. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
